SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Accounts
This class manages the various accounts and the login and registration mechanics.
Animatable
It is implemented by all classes that have the characteristic of having animations
AudioManager
This class imports all audio effects in the game
AudioPlayer
This class contains the game's effects and song.
BlueEnemy
This class manages the BlueEnemy, which is characterized by eating bombs when it passes on them.
BlueEnemyGraphics
This class manages the graphical representation of the blue enemy
Bomb
This class manages the bomb, its explosion and the collisions between it and the other entities in the game
BombGraphics
manages the graphical representation of a bomb
BrownEnemy
This class managed the BrownEnemy, which is characterized by fast and unpredictable movements.
BrownEnemyGraphics
This class manages the graphical representation of the BrownEnemy
Button
This class manages the data of a button, therefore its position, the text contained and whether it is pressed or not
ClownBoss
This class manages the first boss of the game, its characteristic is fast and unpredictable movement
ClownBossGraphics
This class manages the graphical representation of the ClownBoss
CommandInfo
This class contains information regarding the game commands Questo stato contiene le informazioni riguardanti i comandi del gioco
CommandInfoGraphics
This class manages the graphical representation of the command menu
Drawable
This functional interface allows the classes that implement it to draw on the screen.
Enemy
This class contains all the information common to all enemies.
EnemyGraphics
This class manages the graphical representation of enemies
EnemyGraphicsSpawner
This class manages the creation of instances of the EnemyGraphics class of the levels it is associated with
EnemySpawner
This class creates and manages enemies within a game level.
EnemySpawnerManager
This class manages the creation of each level EnemySpawners.
Entity
this class contains all the information common to all entities in the game.
EntityGraphics
This class manages the graphical representation of game entities.
ExplosionCreator
This class contains static methods for creating explosions
FinalBoss
This class manages the final boss of the game, its characteristic is to launch rockets.
FinalBossGraphics
This class manages the graphical representation of the FinalBoss
Game
This class handles all the game execution.
GameFrame
This class is the game window and contains the GamePanel
GameModel
This class handles the logic of switching between game states
GameOver
This class handles the mechanics that happen after the player has lost the game
GameOverScreen
This class handles the graphical representation of the GameOver state
GamePanel
This class is the game panel, which allows you to view all the game components on the screen
Hitbox
The Hitbox is a class that is associated with each entity in the game and manages collisions with the map
ImgImporter
This interface allows the classes that implement it to use a default method that allows you to import an image
JBomberman
This class contains the main method, that instances the class Game and starts the game execution.
KeyManager
This class handles input from keyboard
LastEnemy
This class manages the LastEnemy, whose characteristics are to move through all destructible obstacles, therefore also bombs.
LastEnemyGraphics
This class manages the graphical representation of the LastEnemy
Level
This class manages the level and all its components, i.e. enemies, obstacles and powerups.
LevelGraphics
Manages the graphic representation of the individual levels and all the elements associated with it
LevelManager
This class manages the creation of the model and view of levels.
LoginManager
This class manages the login and so the users creation and saving in the text file.
LoginPanel
This class manages the graphical representation of the login screen
MatchGraphics
This class manages the graphical representation of the game, therefore also the representation of the GameOver, Win and Pause states
Menu
This class handles the mechanics of the start menu
MenuGraphics
This class manages the graphical representation of the initial menu
MouseManager
This class manage mouse inputs, both keys and mouse movement.
Obstacle
This class handles the game's obstacles.
ObstacleGraphics
This class manages the graphical representation of obstacles.
Partita
This class manages the mechanics of the game and all the entities that take part in it.
Pause
This class handles the machanics of the pause state
PauseGraphics
this class manages the graphical representation of the pause state
Player
this class represents the player in the game.
PlayerGraphics
This class manages the graphical representation of the player.
PlayerManager
This class creates Player's model and view.
PowerUp
This class handles the game's power ups.
PowerUpGraphics
This class manages the graphical representation of power ups within the game.
PowerUpType
This enum represents the possible types of power ups present in the game
RedEnemy
This class handles the RedEnemy
RedEnemyGraphics
This class manages the graphical representation of the RedEnemy
Rocket
This class handles the rockets fired by the FinalBoss
RocketGraphics
This class manages the graphical representation of rockets
Settings
This class manages the Settings state i.e. the game settings
SettingsGraphics
This class manages the graphical representation of the settings menu
StateGraphics
This class manages the graphical representation of a State
StateManager
This class creates every game state's model and view, the manages each state change.
Stati
This Enum contains all states of the game
Stato
This class contains all the characteristics common to all game states
StatsMenu
This class manages the mechanics of the statistics menu
StatsMenuGraphics
This class manages the statistics menu
User
This class manages a User's data and its updating
UserView
Manages the graphical representation of a user and his data
Win
Manages the mechanics that happen when the player wins a game
WinGraphics
This class manages the graphical representation of the Win state
YellowEnemy
This class manages the YellowEnemy, whose characteristic is that of having two HP, but being extremely slow.
YellowEnemyGraphics
This class manages the graphical representation of the YellowEnemy
